item.title: By: Eli Weinstock-Herman (tarwn)

item.description: Sure. I was actually intending to make a wiki entry to act as an index and provide links to that and back, but I was procrastinating until I had another post or two. I'll go ahead and add the link and then start the wiki this weekend (there is an outside possibility that I will have 2 posts for next week anyway).

item.title: By: SQLDenis
item.dc:creator: SQLDenis
item.description: can you add links to the other articles to all the posts so that it is easier to continue/go back to the next/previous article?
item.content:encoded: can you add links to the other articles to all the posts so that it is easier to continue/go back to the next/previous article?

item.title: By: Janice Lee
item.dc:creator: Janice Lee
item.content:encoded:
Geez, this was loong! Good job! (Eli, not a biggie but can you set up the links such that they open in another window? It’s kinda a pain to have to click the Back button just to get back to your article. Doing an “open in new tab” is a pain too. And yeah, whining is easy.)

Anyway–I like this! The virtual machine setup is what’s most helpful to me. I’ll give it a try in the next two weeks and thank you again after.;) Any particular reason you installed the 32-bit version of R2?

I really, really, REALLY will be waiting for this post: “creation of a Domain Controller and Domain”. Thanks.
